name: North Venture Partners
overview:
They are a team of progressive business minds who incubate and execute high impact growth strategies for early stage entertainment, lifestyle, and socially-constructive ventures.

North partners crystallize the strategic plan youâ€™ll need to hit the ground running, give your shareholders and investors the confidence they need to support your business, and secure the resources required to move full steam ahead into new markets.

From big brands to small start ups, old school to new school, online to offline, their knowledge and experience runs deep. North partners are all entrepreneurs at heart. They’ve always valued vision over the illusion of a safe bet. Ideas keep them inspired. These ideas provide their juice. Thatâ€™s why from time to time they offer up their combined expertise to help a select group of kindred spirits break on through. North also manages an Angel investment group focused on remarkable new ventures which you can read all about at www.northangels.com.
